slogan: Plant a tree today — breathe better tomorrow.
description: A hardy plant that purifies indoor air and thrives in low light. Ideal for bedrooms or offices.
watering: Water every 2-3 weeks, allowing soil to dry completely between waterings.
sunlight: Thrives in indirect light or low-light areas.
fertilizing: Feed with a balanced houseplant fertilizer once a month during spring and summer.

slogan: More trees, more life — let’s grow our future.
description: A graceful plant with white blooms that helps remove toxins and improve indoor air quality.
watering: Keep soil moist but not soggy; water when top 1 inch of soil is dry.
sunlight: Bright, indirect light; avoid direct sunlight.
fertilizing: Fertilize every 6-8 weeks with a diluted liquid fertilizer.

slogan: A tree is the best friend you’ll never outgrow.
description: A durable indoor plant with vibrant variegated leaves that can tolerate low light conditions.
watering: Water every 1-2 weeks, allowing soil to dry between waterings.
sunlight: Low to medium indirect light is ideal.
fertilizing: Feed monthly with a balanced liquid fertilizer during growing season.

slogan: Green the Earth, clean the air.
description: A fast-growing plant with arching green-and-white leaves that looks great in hanging pots.
watering: Keep soil evenly moist; water when top 1 inch feels dry.
sunlight: Bright, indirect light works best; avoid direct sun.
fertilizing: Feed every 4-6 weeks with a balanced fertilizer.

slogan: Each tree is a promise for a cooler, brighter planet.
description: Famous for its large, split leaves, this tropical beauty adds a bold statement to any room.
watering: Water once a week or when the top 2 inches of soil are dry.
sunlight: Bright, indirect light; tolerates some shade.
fertilizing: Feed with a balanced fertilizer every 4-6 weeks during growing season.

slogan: Bring nature home — let your space breathe.
description: A trailing vine plant with heart-shaped golden-green leaves, perfect for shelves or hanging baskets.
watering: Water when the top inch of soil is dry; avoid overwatering.
sunlight: Thrives in medium to low indirect light.
fertilizing: Feed monthly with a balanced liquid fertilizer during spring and summer.

slogan: Small pots, big impact — grow calm inside.
description: A sun-loving succulent that stores water in its leaves and offers natural healing properties.
watering: Water deeply but infrequently; let soil dry out between watering.
sunlight: Needs bright, indirect sunlight; can handle some direct sun.
fertilizing: Fertilize once or twice a year with a succulent fertilizer.

description: Known for its glossy leaves and tolerance to neglect, the ZZ Plant is perfect for busy plant lovers.
watering: Water every 2-3 weeks; let soil dry completely between waterings.
sunlight: Low to bright indirect light; avoid direct sun.
fertilizing: Feed every 2-3 months with a balanced fertilizer.

slogan: Fresh air, fresh mind — go green indoors.
description: A stunning plant with deep green glossy leaves that can grow tall indoors with proper care.
watering: Water when top 1-2 inches of soil feel dry.
sunlight: Bright, indirect light; can tolerate some shade.
fertilizing: Feed monthly with a balanced liquid fertilizer during spring and summer.
